description.p1: I value designing user touchpoints, capturing brand sensibility, and carefully implementing the intent of planning as a Front-End Developer.
description.p2: I am not afraid of new challenges and enjoy adapting quickly and growing in changing environments.
description.p3: With my experience and passion, I want to grow with great colleagues and build a better future.
description.p4: Feel free to contact me anytime! üòä

highlights: Game Launcher WebApp | Remote Play WebApp | Personalized Ad Web/SDK | Official Web (Portal, Customer Info, Game Web Launch SDK, etc.) | WebSocket Streaming SDK | Unified Payment SDK | Unified Auth SDK | Multiple Console Webs
